device_key.comment: A random string whose value will be set as a permanent cookie to identify a device
device_key.name: device_key

member_id.comment: The member ID authenticated on the device
member_id.name: member_id

user_agent.comment: The user agent string. Note this is not for identification but just for reference, and will be updated when the user upgrades their browser version
user_agent.name: user_agent

login_key.comment: If the user has chosen "remember me", a random string whose value is set as a cookie to facilitate automatic login. NULL if they did not choose "remember me".
login_key.name: login_key

last_seen.comment: A unix timestamp of when the device was last used. Updated at session start, not on every click
last_seen.name: last_seen

anonymous.comment: Binary value indicating if, when the user is automatically logged in, their session should be anonymous
anonymous.name: anonymous

login_handler.comment: The login handler which processed the most recent login (not updated on automatic log ins).
login_handler.name: login_handler

device_key.name: device_key
device_key.comment: The device key as stored in core_members_known_devices.device_key

last_seen.name: last_seen
last_seen.comment: A unix timestamp of when the device was last used on this IP address. Updated at session start, not on every click

params.name: index_container_class
params.comment: The class of the container that relates to index_container_id

created.name: created
created.comment: Unix timestamp of when the club was created

cover_offset.name: cover_offset
cover_offset.comment: The position offset for the cover photo

featured.name: featured
featured.comment: Binary value indicating if club is featured

location_json.name: location_json
location_json.comment: Full \IPS\Geolocation JSON value of club location

location_lat.name: location_lat
location_lat.comment: The latitude of the club location

location_long.name: location_long
location_long.comment: The longitude of the club location

content.name: content
content.comment: Count of all content items + comments

rebuilt.name: rebuilt
rebuilt.comment: Timestamp of when the last_activity and content values were last updated

approved.name: approved
approved.comment: Boolean indicating if club is approved

joined.name: joined
joined.comment: Unix timestamp of when the member joined the club

added_by.name: added_by
added_by.comment: If added by a leader, the leader's member ID. NULL if joined themselves.

invited_by.name: invited_by
invited_by.comment: If invited by another member, the member id. NULL if joined themselves.

status.name: status
status.comment: The status of the membership. member is normal member, requested/invited are in the process of joining, leader is leader, declined means their request to join was declined, banned is banned by a leader

params.name: g_create_clubs
params.comment: The types of club this group can create

node_class.name: node_class
node_class.comment: The class for the type of node

node_id.name: node_id
node_id.comment: The ID number for the node

params.name: g_club_allowed_nodes
params.comment: Node types that can be created in clubs, or * for all

params.name: clubs
params.comment: Comma-delimited list of club IDs or 0 to exclude clubs, or NULL to not filter by clubs

params.name: index_club_id
params.comment: The club ID, or NULL if it does not belong to a club

f_required.name: f_required
f_required.comment: Binary value indicating if the field is required

f_multiple.name: f_multiple
f_multiple.comment: For certain types of fields, if multiple values are supported

f_filterable.name: f_filterable
f_filterable.comment: Binary value indicating if the field should be included in the filter options

promote_class_id.comment: The main ID for the content item/comment
promote_class_id.name: promote_class_id

promote_text.comment: JSON array of text for all services
promote_text.name: promote_text

promote_added.comment: The date the item was authored or last edited
promote_added.name: promote_added

promote_scheduled.comment: The date the item is to be sent out
promote_scheduled.name: promote_scheduled

promote_sent.comment: The date the item was sent out
promote_sent.name: promote_sent

promote_schedule_auto.name: promote_schedule_auto
promote_schedule_auto.comment: A flag to note if this has been auto scheduled (1) or manually scheduled (0)

promote_share_to.name: promote_share_to
promote_share_to.comment: JSON array of share service names (facebook, twitter)

promote_returned.name: promote_returned
promote_returned.comment: JSON array of data returned from the post

promote_failed.name: promote_failed
promote_failed.comment: The number of times this has failed to send

response_sent_date.name: response_sent_date
response_sent_date.comment: Timestamp of when sent was triggered as this will vary from actual response time

promote_enabled.name: promote_enabled
promote_enabled.comment: Whether the rule is enabled or not

promote_filters.name: promote_filters
promote_filters.comment: Json-encoded array of filters that a member must meet in order for this rule to apply

promote_actions.name: promote_actions
promote_actions.comment: Json-encoded array of actions taken when this rule applies

params.name: g_promote_exclude
params.comment: Exclude members in this group from group promotions

params.name: permission_array
params.comment: A cache of the clubs and social groups that the member is in
